static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SpeckleFilter.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00056                                                             {
00057         // create output directory
00058         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("speckle");
00059         
00060         // read input
00061         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00062         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00063 
00064         // add noise
00065         Random rand = new Random();
00066         final int NOISE = 200;
00067         for (int i=0; i < 1000; ++i){
00068             int x = rand.nextInt(popdensity.getNumLat());
00069             int y = rand.nextInt(popdensity.getNumLon());
00070             int add = NOISE + rand.nextInt(NOISE/2);
00071             popdensity.setValue(x, y, popdensity.getValue(x,y) + add);
00072         }
00073         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "noisy", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00074         
00075         // dilate
00076         LatLonGrid dilate1 = new SpeckleFilter(3,NOISE).filter(popdensity);
00077         KmlWriter.write(dilate1, out, "speckle_3", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00078     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.SpeckleFilter.speckleFilter ( final LatLonGrid  input  )  

00035                                                            {
00036         LatLonGrid smoothed = smFilter.filter(input);
00037         LatLonGrid output = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00038         int[][] inData = input.getData();
00039         int[][] smData = smoothed.getData();
00040         int nx = inData.length;
00041         int ny = inData[0].length;
00042         for (int i=0; i < nx; ++i){
00043             for (int j=0; j < ny; ++j){
00044                 if (inData[i][j] != input.getMissing() &&
00045                     smData[i][j] != smoothed.getMissing()){
00046                     int diff = Math.abs(inData[i][j] - smData[i][j]);
00047                     if (diff > maxChange){ // noise
00048                         output.setValue(i,j, smData[i][j]);
00049                     }
00050                 }
00051             }
00052         }
00053         return output;
00054     }
